content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day May 12, 2020 You Should Enlist Your Employees in Threat Detection May 12, 2020 Your employees instincts are incredibly valuable and can help you crowdsource threats. With Cyren Inbox Security, theyre one click away from flagging an email as suspicious, and telling Cyren to search for lookalike emails in the system.
